detail_desc: Voluminous, A-line tunic in an airy cotton weave with a double-layered, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Long balloon sleeves with smocking at the top and cuffs with pearly buttons. Smocking below and a wide gathered tier creating movement to the hem. Airy cotton weave lining.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the hips and a tiered skirt.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a stand-up collar and button band with covered buttons down the front. Gathered yoke front and back, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, elastication at the back of the waist and press-studs at the sides. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail, an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide elastic panel at the hem. Extra firm support.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed texture. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Ribbed panels at the sides for best fit.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in satin with short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a double drawstring and slits in the sides.
Cardigan in a soft mohair-blend knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in soft, brushed, stretch fabric with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One-button fastening at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, long sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a bell-shaped skirt.

Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and small slits at the sides of the hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-on fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dungaree shorts in stretch twill with appliqués, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a chest pocket. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy, patterned weave with a double-layered wrapover front. Decorative metal rings and ties at the top and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Bomber jacket woven in a nylon blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip and tab with press-studs. Zip down the front, a chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Wide blouse in a crinkled weave with lace trims and embroidered details. V-shaped opening at the top, a seam under the bust and at the hem and long, wide sleeves with pleats and covered elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Trousers in an airy cotton weave. Relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and fake back pockets.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Small shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.

Wide satin shirt in a slightly shorter style with embroidered appliqués. Notch lapels, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round clip earrings in metal with a leopard print. Length 7 cm.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Crinkled velvet trousers with a regular waist, zip fly with and hook-and-eye fastener and straight legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Earrings made from recycled metal decorated with sparkly stones and glass beads. Length 9 cm.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and fastening with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and back pockets.
Hairband in elasticated velour with an appliqué on top.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long hole-patterned sleeves and no buttons.
Shaping briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the tummy and hips.
3/4-length trousers in a cotton weave with wide, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Wide, straight legs with scalloped broderie anglaise at the hems.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
A-line nursing top in soft Tencel™ lyocell jersey with long sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Airy chiffon blouse in a relaxed fit with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke at the back with decorative gathers and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Knee-length dress in airy mesh with beaded appliqués, short sleeves with a frill trim and a seam with a double frill trim at the hem. Jersey underdress.
Joggers in velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print and embroidered motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and a short slit at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short dress in patterned mesh with long sleeves, a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties at one side. Partly lined.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft thermal fleece.
